beds24.apiKeyInfo: You will need an API key to integrate with Beds24

beds24.apiKeyV2Optional: API V2 is not required, but may be needed for some features in the future

beds24.verifiedSuccess: API key successfully verified! Now you can link properties.

propertySearch.title: Property Search
propertySearch.noAccess: You don't have access to this section
propertySearch.lowConfidenceDescription: AI is not fully confident in interpreting your query.
propertySearch.lowConfidenceRecommendation: We recommend clarifying search parameters or viewing detailed interpretation.
propertySearch.startDialogWithAI: Start a dialog with AI to search for properties
propertySearch.aiSearchDescription: Describe what you're looking for in your own words. AI will help find the perfect option.
propertySearch.clientAgentDescription: Communicate with clients through AI agent. It will answer questions and find options.
propertySearch.searchPlaceholder: Example: 2 bedroom apartment in Kamala area, budget up to 100k baht, check-in December 15 for a month

advancedSearch.searchBelowMax: Search cheaper or equal to budget
advancedSearch.toleranceTooltip: Tolerance allows searching for properties within ±N days
advancedSearch.searchWithinDays: Search within ±{{days}} days from specified dates
advancedSearch.nightsTooltip: How many nights do you want to stay
advancedSearch.searchWindowTooltip: In which period to search for available dates
advancedSearch.searchingNights: Searching for {{duration}} available nights in the specified period
advancedSearch.clickInstruction: Click once for desired, twice for must have
advancedSearch.ownershipInfo: ℹFreehold - full ownership forever. Leasehold - long-term lease (usually 30-90 years). Company - ownership through Thai company.

aiDescriptionGenerator.title: AI Description Generation
aiDescriptionGenerator.conditionsNotMet: Not all conditions for generation are met
aiDescriptionGenerator.pleaseWait: Please wait another {{minutes}} min. before regenerating
aiDescriptionGenerator.featuresAdded: These features have been automatically added to the property.
aiDescriptionGenerator.tipDescription: The more data about the property - the better the description will be.
aiDescriptionGenerator.additionalRequirementsDescription: You can specify additional requirements for description generation. This is optional - the description will be generated without them.
aiDescriptionGenerator.additionalPromptPlaceholder: Example: Mention proximity to school, emphasize family-friendly area, add information about long-term rental options...
aiDescriptionGenerator.requirementsNote: These requirements will be added to the main prompt and considered during generation.

aiInterpretationModal.title: AI Query Understanding
aiInterpretationModal.subtitle: How AI interpreted your query
aiInterpretationModal.mediumAccuracyDescription: AI is not fully confident in query interpretation. We recommend checking and clarifying search parameters.
aiInterpretationModal.noParametersDescription: AI could not extract parameters from your query. Try to formulate your query more specifically or use advanced search.

aiPropertyCreation.title: Create property with AI
aiPropertyCreation.subtitle: Automatic data extraction from text
aiPropertyCreation.howItWorksDescription: Paste a property description from any source (messenger message, listing, notes). AI will automatically recognize and structure all data: characteristics, prices, commissions, availability calendar, owner information and download photos from Google Drive.
aiPropertyCreation.placeholder:
Example:

Property Anchan Flora, number 55. Sale price 55M, rent 200k from January to March, other times 300k, annual rental contract 150k. 2 floors, 500sq inside, 1000 non-living, 1200 plot. Freehold. Pets allowed, Bangtao area, 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, 2 parking spaces.

Features: kitchen, TV, internet, pool, garden. Sea view.

Occupancy: occupied from December 15 to February 5.

Google maps link: https://maps.app.goo.gl/example
Photos: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/example
Owner: Anna, tel +66123456789
aiPropertyCreation.importantDescription: After creating the property, be sure to check all data, especially prices, dates and contact information. AI may make mistakes in interpreting some data.
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep1: Open Google Drive and find the photos folder
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep2: Right-click on the folder → Share settings
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep3: Change settings to 'Anyone with the link'
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep4: Copy the link and use it in the description
aiPropertyCreation.alternativeOption: Alternative: upload photos manually after creating the property

aiResponseViewer.title: AI Assistant Response
aiResponseViewer.flexibleSearchDesc: Searching for {{duration}} nights in period from {{start}} to {{end}}
aiResponseViewer.lowConfidenceDescription: We recommend clarifying search parameters for more accurate results

calendarManager.addSyncDesc: Connect calendars from external platforms (Airbnb, Booking.com, etc.)
calendarManager.selectDaysDescription: Click on dates in the calendar that you want to block. You can select any number of dates
calendarManager.selectPeriodDescription: First click on the start date, then on the end date
calendarManager.noCalendarDataDesc: This property has no blocked dates or bookings yet
calendarManager.title: Availability Calendar
calendarManager.addPeriodDesc: Block a continuous period of dates (e.g., from 1st to 10th)
calendarManager.selectDaysDesc: Select specific individual days on the calendar
calendarManager.selectPeriodDates: Select start and end of period
calendarManager.selectPeriodRequired: You must select a period or days
calendarManager.icsCreatedAfter: ICS calendar will be created after saving the property
calendarManager.syncCalendarsDesc: Connect calendars from Airbnb, Booking.com and other platforms
calendarManager.noExternalCalendarsDesc: Add external calendars for automatic occupancy synchronization
calendarManager.deleteCalendarDesc: Do you also want to delete dates that were imported from this calendar?
calendarManager.selectDatesOnCalendar: Select dates on the calendar by clicking on them
calendarManager.selectOtherPeriod: Select another period or use force add
calendarManager.infoDescription: Selected dates will be marked as occupied in the calendar
calendarManager.howToGetAirbnb: How to get link from Airbnb?
calendarManager.howToGetBooking: How to get link from Booking.com?
calendarManager.airbnbStep1: Log in to your Airbnb account and go to 'Calendar'
calendarManager.airbnbStep3: Copy the calendar link and paste it in the field above
calendarManager.bookingStep1: Log in to Booking.com extranet and go to 'Calendar'
calendarManager.bookingStep3: Copy the calendar link and paste it in the field above
calendarManager.noConflictsDesc: All calendars are synced correctly, no overlaps
calendarManager.conflictsDetectedDesc: Found dates that are marked as occupied in multiple calendars simultaneously
calendarManager.syncStep1: All active calendars will be loaded and processed
calendarManager.syncStep2: Dates from calendars will be added to the general availability calendar
calendarManager.syncStep3: Conflicting dates will be merged (occupancy preserved)
calendarManager.syncStep4: Property ICS file will be updated with current data
calendarManager.icsFileCreated: ICS calendar successfully created and ready to use
calendarManager.icsUsage1: Copy the link above and add it to Airbnb, Booking.com or other platforms
calendarManager.icsUsage2: The calendar automatically updates when occupancy changes
calendarManager.icsUsage3: Use this link to sync with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.
calendarManager.datesAddedTemporarily: Added {{count}} date(s) temporarily. They will be saved after creating the property.
calendarManager.periodAddedForced: Period added forcefully, conflicting dates removed

groups.title: How to get group Chat ID?

1. Add the bot to the group
2. Write any message in the group
3. Use special bots (e.g. @getidsbot) to get the Chat ID
